Perceptor:

Perceptor received the shot and he fell, aparently without life.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Firestrike smirked with amusement.  "My pleasure..." he said 
> loudly.  Bending down he went to pick up the bot off his knees. The 
> pistol aimed at the head of Perceptor.  "Bang" he said as he pulled 
> the trigger.
